author: lzybkr
body:
I was seeing process ids with 6 digits in RS3 and the default output wasn't wide enough.
In fixing, I also noticed that the view for `ps -IncludeUserName` could use a wider column for the user name.

I also moved all the formatting code higher up in the tree, it never felt like it belonged where it was.

title: Use wider columns for process id and user
